author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Go to https://ground.news/sabine to get 40% Off the Vantage plan and see through sensationalized reporting. Stay fully informed on events around the world with Ground News.

AI is becoming an increasingly important decision maker in our society whether you like it or not. But does AI already have free will? And should it be made responsible for its decisions? Philosophers are arguing both sides of the issue – let’s take a look.

Paper 1: https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s43681-025-00740-6
Paper 2: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.08853

title: Does AI Already Have Free Will?
